items.name: Video Game Sales Wiki
items.title: Video Game Sales Wiki
items.headline: Welcome to the Video Game Sales Wiki!
items.desc: Welcome to the Video Games Sales Wiki, the wiki about Video Game Sales that anyone can edit. This wiki contains sales figures, updated routinely, on all video game and console sales, across platforms -- PS3, Xbox 360, Nintendo 3DS, PSVita, Nintendo Wii U, and more. We will have the data for the upcoming generation of consoles, as well, as soon as the information is available.
